feed.title: Jaeyoon Song
feed.subtitle: Jaeyoon Song is an undergraduate student studying Business, Information Science, and Computer Science at Seoul National University. She is interested in computer-supported cooperative work, which is a subfield of human-computer interaction (HCI).

entry.title: Many Ideas: Motivation-supportive crowd-civic system
entry.content: Many Ideas is a crowd-civic system in which members of a community engage with each other to collect issues, generate ideas, and discuss matters of concern. The system acts as a testbed for researching new design to increase diverse participation. In our first study, we investigated the effect of personalized motivation-supportive messages.
